授業目的:
「英語BI」をベースにリスニングとスピーキングの技能をさらに発展させて活かし、ライティングでは段落構成をもとに作文ができるようにする。

理解できる程度のやや長い文章を含む会話の実践とより範囲が広がった複雑な表現の構文の練習により習得したリスニングとスピーキングの技能をさらに発展させて活かす。
到達目標:
効果的に会話をするために必要とされる社交性も重視し、それをもとに自分自身の履歴、過去の経験を論じ、自分自身の意見を明確に発表し、そして将来の計画についても語ることができるようになる。

音声面では、音の弱化、同化、省略などの主な連接音を聞き取りまた発話できるようになる。

ライティングでは主題文と補足文に基づいた適格な段落構成ができるようになる。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This is a communication focused course, classes will be based on interactive communication using a combination of pair and group work, to help boost students English communication abilities and vocabulary knowledge.
授業方法:
全員出席をもとに、ロールプレイ、調査, ゲームを含むペアワークとグループワークは授業
の中では特に重要な部分となる。
Students will develop their English communication skills by performing learning activities and holding
discussions in pairs, groups of four and whole class groups.
Sessions will be conducted 'face to face.'

[Students with permission to study online]
On-demand A classes will be held using Microsoft Teams. Please see LUNA for a link to join.

Post-vacation warm-up activities.
Unit 7. Journeys: students will talk about travel around the world and plan their own four-day trip (Part 1).

Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 2 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).

Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 4 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).

Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 9 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).

Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 10 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第11回: Unit 12. Future goals: students will discuss their plans for the future and how they can achieve them (Part 2).

第12回: Class project (1). Students will form groups and create ideas to present to the class. This is a chance to be creative and is not limited to an academic style presentation using PowerPoint.
Practice and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第13回:
Class project (2). Students will practice and then show their project to the class.
Reflection: time will be given for students to reflect on the course and their progress this year.
Prepare for the final speaking test (about 2 hours).
第14回: Review & final speaking test. Students will talk about the topics covered this semester using the English they have learned. Tests will be done in pairs.
Students will discuss final assessment and grading throughout the course
